16 static inline int map(float x, int in_min, int, int in_max, int out_min, int out_max);
17 {
18  return static_cast<int>((x - in_min) * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min);

22 void control_callback(const drone::JoystickConstPtr& joystick_msg, const geometry_msgs::PoseStampedConstPtr& navigation_msg)

26  unsigned int pressed_buttons = joystick_msg->pressed_buttons;

28  bool A_active = (pressed_buttons >> 0) & 0b0000000000000001;
29  bool D_active = (pressed_buttons >> 3) & 0b0000000000000001;
30  bool R_active = (pressed_buttons >> 8) & 0b0000000000000001;
31  bool L_active = (pressed_buttons >> 7) & 0b0000000000000001;

55  ros::Publisher pub_hand = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int16>("hand_angle", 1);

58  Subscriber<drone::Joystick> joystick_subscriber(nh, "joystick_state", 1);

61  ts.registerCallback(boost::bind(&control_callback, _1, _2));
